attributes.action: Investigate banks crash selling peoples homes & businesses in the pandemic
attributes.additional_details: The petition represents 66 million citizens, 4 million SME's and 2.5 million veterans many of whom had business loans and commercial retail shop mortgages and pensions pulled but where regulatory bodies: FCA, SFO, F/O, BBRS, TS, CAB and Legal Ombudsman have been completely powerless during Covid. People are losing lives and families and perfectly good businesses destroyed because financiers, pensions, & lawyers greed and bullying acting for large Corporations and making extra fees on withdrawal.
attributes.background: Businesses, families and individuals severely damaged by lenders pulling finance in Covid. Growing media evidence of bullying and threats caused by lenders, pensions & lawyers increasing their withdrawal fees & onerous home security. Retrospective investigation requested leading up to the pandemic.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about certain actions by banks, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government to investigate.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what practices or issues you would like the Government to investigate.
